column4: after I removed compiz and emerald, I have no window decoration anymore, FF won't appear and my splashscreen is hanging
is there a command I should run when I removed compiz ?
man, this is annoying :) I have to start my vm to get to the internet :D
FF won't start, no application does start
I need my Gnome to run again :)
click on edit in vmware>vitual network configure
in that one,browse to tab dhcp,>dhcp service,>restart>apply,then to nat>nat service>restart>apply
you got me, are you using vmware workstation?
you don't know what I was talking about :)
my gtk window decorator does not work
